mapper.insert: insert into cal_user (id, email, name, nickname, password, image, comment, social, birthdate) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{name}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{image}, #{comment}, #{social}, #{birthdate}::timestamp)
mapper.select: select id, email, name, nickname, password, image, comment, social from cal_user where email = #{email}
select id, email, name, nickname, password, image, comment, social from cal_user where id = #{id}
